Helderberg Pain Clinic in Somerset West

Pain is a complex phenomenon with which many have to deal with on a daily basis. Often misunderstood and seldom local. It can present dissociatively, behave irratiaclly and is as ilusive to diagnose as it is stuborn to treat.

Helderberg Pain Clinic has built a reputation on understanding, defining and managing the field of pain. We are experts at seeing pain hollistically and solving underlying problems rather than treating superficial

Enquire

Dr. Louis Smit

Head practitioner at Helderberg Pain Clinic

MB.ChB.(Stell) Dip. Obst.(SA), DA(SA), NDT(Sed), FIPP

Professional background

Dr. Louis Smit is an internationally qualified and experience specialist in the field of pain. After completing his undergraduate studies locally, he practiced in Canada, before returning to further his expertise in anesthetics.

He cemented his education by completing his Fellowship in Interventional Pain at the renowned World Institute of Pain in the Netherlands.

FIPP Certification

Personal journey

After being diagnosed with Guillain Barre Syndrome, Dr. Smit is intimately familiar with the path to recovery. Learning to walk, write and live again provided him with a painful, yet irreplacable understanding of the subject.

A combination of education and experience has culminated in a holistic approach to the patient as body, soul and spirit. The Helderberg Pain Clinic shares this view of surpasing a mere biomedical analysis in order to truly help their patients thrive and enjoy lasting vitality.

Diagnosis

From narrowing in on the point of pain, to identifying root causes and lifestyle contributers

Treatment

Holistic approach to applying the latest advancements in pain management and treatment

Rehabilitation

Ensuring long term relief and walking the road to recovery together

Physical therapy

Massage, Physiotherapy, Pilates, Biokinetics, Chiropractic and TENS tretments

Lifestyle changes

Guiding patients to manage their issues by means of lifestyle alterations

Psycological support

Coping training and stress management- completing the circle of comprehensive pain treatment

Open ablative Surgery

Expert surgical intervention for serious cases which dictate more drastic measures

Underlying cause treatment

Looking past superficial symptoms to treat the deep seated issues presenting as pain

Analgesia & Adjuvent medication

Complete range of pharmacological interventions, selected with the greatest care and caution

Minimally invasive treatmetns

Quick and comfortable per-cutaneous interventional treatment

Alteratives

Various alternative, non-allopathic healers available for all circumstances
